short_summary: Expert facilitation services for MPC meetings.
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires the services of one (1) Senior Facilitator Consultant for Marine Planning and Conservation meetings (MPC).
full_summary:
**Solicitation Title**: Expert-Consultant Facilitator for Marine Planning and Conservation Meetings
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01018715
**Solicitation Number**: 30003299
**Publication Date**: December 29, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023, 14:00:00
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
**Trade Agreements**: All eligible bidders are required to be a Supreme Court of Canada certified supplier under the Trade Agreements listed (Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement)
**Tender Status**: Expiring
### Requirement Description
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a Senior Facilitator Consultant to facilitate Marine Planning and Conservation meetings (MPC) from contract award to March 31, 2024. The contract includes two irrevocable options to extend for one-year periods. The Facilitator Consultant will provide meeting facilitation services, including strategic planning at the director level and developing integrated work plans to ensure consistency and communication between directorates in Aquatic Ecosystems.
**Level of Effort**
The estimated level of effort for the contract is 372 hours. Each option to extend the contract by a one-year period, if exercised, will also have an estimated level of effort of 372 hours.

**Contract Details**

*   Contract Award Date: N/A
*   Contract End Date (Initial Term): March 31, 2024
*   Contract End Date (Option 1): March 31, 2025
*   Contract End Date (Option 2): March 31, 2026

**Eligibility and Conditions**
This solicitation is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders (SAH) under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 for the 2.15 Facilitator Consultant category. Suppliers not currently qualified as SAH must contact PSPC's SA Authority for the TSPS SA to be added to the supplier profile.

**Technical Requirements and Specifications**
The Facilitator Consultant must have expertise in facilitating group meetings, strategic planning, anddeveloping integrated work plans. The successful bidder will be required to provide copies of their résum
